summary: During the 1930s, a teenager yearns for a Catholic girl, whose only desire is to reform his sinful tendencies. Hormones raging, the young man channels his unsatisfied lust into the only outlet available: savage, crazed violence.
cast: Hideki Takahashi|Junko Asano|Yûsuke Kawazu|Chikako Miyagi|Takeshi Katô|Isao Tamagawa|Jun Hamamura|Asao Sano|Kensuke Akashi|Iwae Arai|Hiroyuki Atami|Hiroshi Chiyoda|Hiroshi Chô|Hideo Fukuhara|Yûzô Harumi|Michio Hino|Akira Hisamatsu|Yôko Hokota|Masaaki Honme|Tetsurô Ishibiya|Keiichi Ishikawa|Seishirô Iwate|Yû Izumi|Keizô Kagawa|Masahiro Kataoka|Mitsuo Kataoka|Tadayuki Kitakami|Wataru Kobayashi|Tamaki Komiyama|Takashi Konagai|Takehiko Maeda|Kayo Matsuo|Hiroshi Midorikawa|Ken Mizoguchi|Kuniya Mizukawa|Keiji Mizuki|Aiko Natsuyama|Yoshiyuki Nemoto|Keisuke Noro|Seijirô Onda|Ryôichi Satô|Ken'ichi Shikita|Hajime Sugiyama|Yoshihiko Tabata|Hiroshi Tachikawa|Akira Takahashi|Hiroshi Takao|Masahiro Yafuji|Yoshinori Ôba|Daisuke Ômi
title: Kenka erejî
